entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
